functions.name: save_file_sandbox
functions.description: Saves a file in the sandbox environment, ensuring persistence.

parameters.file_path: Path of the file to save.
parameters.content: Content to be saved in the file.

functions.returns: Boolean indicating success of the operation.

functions.name: read_file_sandbox
functions.description: Reads a file's content from the sandbox environment.

parameters.file_path: Path of the file to read.
